statements: DELETE FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE area_name = 'Downtown' AND pollutant_type = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollutant_level > 50 AND area_name = 'Suburb';
DELETE FROM city_areas WHERE area_name = 'Downtown' AND pollution_threshold > 50.00;
DELETE FROM CityArea WHERE pollution_level = 'High' AND population > 100000;
DELETE FROM Area WHERE area_name = 'Downtown' AND city_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Air_Quality_Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Pollution';
DELETE FROM Air_Quality_Reading WHERE pm_25 > 50 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
